languages.text: "Элантах, неужели...". {n}Сдавленный вздох слышится из комм-бусины в ухе.{/n} "Мои поиски зашли в тупик? Я отправилась во тьму космоса вместе с мон-кай, надеясь отыскать собратьев. А нашла... лишь трупы, погребенные человеческой ненавистью". {n}Голос эльдарки дрожит то ли от отчаяния, то ли от гнева.{/n}

"Elantach, has..." {n}The comm-bead in your ear delivers a stifled gasp.{/n} "Has my search come to a dead end? I ventured into the darkness of space with the mon-keigh, hoping to find my kin... But all I found were corpses buried by human hatred." {n}Yrliet's voice trembles either with desperation or anger.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Элантах, неужели...". {n}Сдавленный вздох слышится из комм-бусины в ухе.{/n} "Мои поиски зашли в тупик? Я отправилась во тьму космоса вместе с мон-кай, надеясь отыскать собратьев. А нашла... лишь трупы, погребенные человеческой ненавистью". {n}Голос эльдарки дрожит то ли от отчаяния, то ли от гнева.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Elantach, has...". {n}The comm-bead in your ear delivers a stifled gasp.{/n} "Has my search come to a dead end? I ventured into the darkness of space with the mon-keigh, hoping to find my kin.. But all I found was corpses buried by human hatred." {n}Yrliet's voice trembles with exasperation and anger.{/n}

"Elantach, has...". {n}The comm-bead in your ear delivers a stifled gasp.{/n} "Has my search come to a dead end? I ventured into the darkness of space with the mon-keigh, hoping to find my kin.. But all I found was corpses buried by human hatred." {n}Yrliet's voice trembles with exasperation and anger.{/n}

But all I found were corpses buried by human hatred." {n}Yrliet's voice trembles either with desperation or anger.{/n}

"Elantach, has..." {n}The comm-bead in your ear delivers a stifled gasp.{/n} "Has my search come to a dead end? I ventured into the darkness of space with the mon-keigh, hoping to find my kin... But all I found were corpses buried by human hatred." {n}Yrliet's voice trembles either with desperation or anger.{/n}

languages.text: “外界人……”{n}你耳中的通讯珠传来了压抑的喘息声。{/n}“我的搜索难道只能到此为止了吗？我与猴子同行，冒险进入了黑暗的太空之中，希望能找到我幸存的亲族……可我一路上找到的只有尸体，被人类的仇恨埋葬。”{n}伊莉耶特的声音颤抖着，充满了绝望与愤怒。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Elantach, has..." {n}The comm-bead in your ear delivers a stifled gasp.{/n} "Has my search come to a dead end? I ventured into the darkness of space with the mon-keigh, hoping to find my kin... But all I found were corpses buried by human hatred." {n}Yrliet's voice trembles either with desperation or anger.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “外界人……”{n}你耳中的通讯珠传来了压抑的喘息声。{/n}“我的搜索难道只能到此为止了吗？我与猴子同行，冒险进入了黑暗的太空之中，希望能找到我幸存的亲族……可我一路上找到的只有尸体，被人类的仇恨埋葬。”{n}伊莉耶特的声音颤抖着，充满了绝望与愤怒。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Un soupir s'échappe du communicateur dans votre oreille.{/n} « Elantach... Ma quête est-elle dans l'impasse ? Je me suis aventurée dans les ténèbres de l'espace avec les mon-keigh dans l'espoir de retrouver les miens... mais tout ce que je trouve, ce sont leurs cadavres ensevelis sous la haine humaine. » {n}La voix d'Yrliet tremble de désespoir ou de colère.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Elantach, has..." {n}The comm-bead in your ear delivers a stifled gasp.{/n} "Has my search come to a dead end? I ventured into the darkness of space with the mon-keigh, hoping to find my kin... But all I found were corpses buried by human hatred." {n}Yrliet's voice trembles either with desperation or anger.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Un soupir s'échappe du communicateur dans votre oreille.{/n} « Elantach... Ma quête est-elle dans l'impasse ? Je me suis aventurée dans les ténèbres de l'espace avec les mon-keigh dans l'espoir de retrouver les miens... mais tout ce que je trouve, ce sont leurs cadavres ensevelis sous la haine humaine. » {n}La voix d'Yrliet tremble de désespoir ou de colère.{/n}

languages.text: "Elantach, hat ..."{n}Aus dem Voxstecker in deinem Ohr ertönt ein unterdrücktes Atmen.{/n} "Ist meine Suche an einem toten Punkt angelangt? Ich bin {mf|dem|der} Chem-Pan-Sey in die Dunkelheit des Weltraums in der Hoffnung gefolgt, mein Volk zu finden ... Aber ich stieß nur auf Leichen, die durch Menschenhass ins Grab gebracht wurden." {n}Yrliets Stimme zittert, entweder vor Verzweiflung oder Wut.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Elantach, has..." {n}The comm-bead in your ear delivers a stifled gasp.{/n} "Has my search come to a dead end? I ventured into the darkness of space with the mon-keigh, hoping to find my kin... But all I found were corpses buried by human hatred." {n}Yrliet's voice trembles either with desperation or anger.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Elantach, hat ..."{n}Aus dem Voxstecker in deinem Ohr ertönt ein unterdrücktes Atmen.{/n} "Ist meine Suche an einem toten Punkt angelangt? Ich bin {mf|dem|der} Chem-Pan-Sey in die Dunkelheit des Weltraums in der Hoffnung gefolgt, mein Volk zu finden ... Aber ich stieß nur auf Leichen, die durch Menschenhass ins Grab gebracht wurden." {n}Yrliets Stimme zittert, entweder vor Verzweiflung oder Wut.{/n}

languages.text: «Elantach, ¿se...?». {n}La cuenta de comunicación emite un grito ahogado.{/n} «¿Se ha acabado mi búsqueda? He atravesado el espacio con los mon-keigh, esperando dar con los míos... Pero no he encontrado más que cadáveres enterrados bajo el odio de los humanos». {n}La voz de Yrliet tiembla, ya sea de desesperación o de odio.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Elantach, has..." {n}The comm-bead in your ear delivers a stifled gasp.{/n} "Has my search come to a dead end? I ventured into the darkness of space with the mon-keigh, hoping to find my kin... But all I found were corpses buried by human hatred." {n}Yrliet's voice trembles either with desperation or anger.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Elantach, ¿se...?». {n}La cuenta de comunicación emite un grito ahogado.{/n} «¿Se ha acabado mi búsqueda? He atravesado el espacio con los mon-keigh, esperando dar con los míos... Pero no he encontrado más que cadáveres enterrados bajo el odio de los humanos». {n}La voz de Yrliet tiembla, ya sea de desesperación o de odio.{/n}

languages.text: 「エランタが…」{n}耳元の通信機から息をのむ音が聞こえた。{/n}「捜索は行き詰まったのか？私は血族を見つけ出すべく、モン＝ケイと共に宇宙の闇に飛び込んだ。しかし、私が見つけたのは、人間の憎しみに埋もれた死体だけだった」{n}ユリエットの声は絶望か怒りで震えている。{/n}

I ventured into the darkness of space with the mon-keigh, hoping to find my kin... But all I found were corpses buried by human hatred." {n}Yrliet's voice trembles either with desperation or anger.{/n}
